Title: The One Where Michael Leaves
Plot: Michael and George Michael leave for Phoenix but go back to ensure the family misses them. Lindsay wants to have an open marriage, which causes Tobias to try to join the Blue Man Group under the impression that they are a support group for depressed men. Lucille signs Buster up for the army after being goaded by a Michael Moore lookalike. Gob becomes president of the Bluth Company.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Lynne Marie Stewart, Bill Rutkoski, Steve Tom, Jay Johnston, Ian Roberts, Blue Man Group, Ed Helms
